title: Police: 12-year-old boy shot in face at Pennsylvania shooting range
content:
HALFMOON TOWNSHIP, Pa. - Pennsylvania State Police said that a 12-year-old boy was shot in the face at a state shooting range in Central Pennsylvania.
Officials said the incident happened at the Pennsylvania Game Commission’s Scotia Range in Halfmoon Township, located in Centre County.
The boy was taken to the hospital.
No further information was immediately available.
